name: Lorraine Ellen Scott
what_you_do: Lorraine Scott is a professional Reflexologist, Reiki Master Teacher and owner of Loflex Holistic Services.
who_you_serve: Lorraine specializes in providing healing for healers and advocating for busy women to take their own self-healing seriously.
social_proof: Lorraine is a member the Reflexology Association of British Columbia and acted as Secretary of the Board for 4 years. As a Reiki Teacher, she is accredited by the Canadian Reiki Association and upholds their high standards of teaching and ethics.
business_focus: Lorraine provides holistic healing services and teaches workshops and online courses.
service_provided: Reflexology, Reiki, Emotional Freedom Technique, Crystal Healing, Meditation, Sound Healing
